about_the_game:
In Binary Barrier, you take on the role of an ancient AI mastermind tasked with defending your AI capital against relentless alien invasions. Drawing inspiration from classic arcade space shoot 'em ups, Binary Barrier is a genre-bending tower defense game where each playthrough is unique.

Destroy alien species

Your core mission is to defend your base by strategically combating waves of aggressive alien species. As you progress, you'll face increasingly challenging foes requiring all of your biological intelligence.

Expand your base intelligently

Expand your base strategically by building turrets and installing modules to create the perfect defense barrier. Select from randomly generated upgrades to unlock weirdly powerful technologies that can turn the tide of battle in your favor. Each run will feel unique. Experiment with different combinations to find the most effective defense against varied alien threats. But be wary of your energy…

Research alien technology

Dissect alien bodies and ships to gather data on their biology and technology. Delve deep into the research tree and choose your path, discovering new weapons, defenses, and abilities that lead to screen-filling explosions and epic moments of destruction.

Who will dominate: Life or AI?

Discover an ancient secret that challenges age-old questions: who will dominate the universe, life, or AI? Dive into Binary Barrier and command your forces to victory in this intense battle for survival and supremacy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570T / AMD A10-5800K APU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 (1024 Mb) Radeon HD 7750 (1024 Mb), Iris Pro Graphics 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U / AMD Ryzen 5 2500U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4096 Mb) Radeon RX 470 (4096 Mb) Iris Xe Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Defend your AI capital against endless alien invasions in this space shmup-inspired tower defense with roguelite randomness. Dissect bodies and ships to unlock weirdly powerful tech. Upgrade your base with turrets, turning your screen into a symphony of perfect destruction!
